scene_description_enriched: A figure, likely a prophet or saint, is depicted in a contemplative pose. The figure wears a draped garment of pale blue and red, with a striped head covering. Their right hand is raised, with the index finger extended, as if in speech or prophecy. The background is a textured gold, suggesting a divine or celestial setting, with dark, cloud-like forms scattered around. A blue band encircles the scene, further emphasizing its otherworldly nature.
